import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import useGithub from '../../hooks/github-hooks'; import * as S from './styled'; const Profile = () => { const {githubState} = useGithub(); return (

{githubState.user.name}

Username:

{githubState.user.login}

Followers

{githubState.user.followers}

Gists

{githubState.user.public_gists}

Following

{githubState.user.following}

Repos

{githubState.user.public_repos}
) } export default Profile;
